main.name: Prashant Garbuja
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing secure spring based applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: Java Developer
about.about: I am a Software developer based in Sydney, Australia. Passionate about technology since childhood, my affinity for computer games ignited my curiosity. Configuring PC settings and devising workarounds to play new games cultivated my passion. My interests extend to reading, budget-dependent travel, and embracing the unfamiliarâ€”a contrast to my introverted childhood. In the tech realm, coding is my canvas. Beginning with C and C++, I progressed to languages like C#, Java, and Python. Java's verbosity maintains my core knowledge. A Bachelor's in Computer Science Engineering in Bangalore fulfilled my dual goals of exploration and tech pursuit. Currently in Sydney, I completed a master's in Information Technology. Engaging in tech seminars and Java meetups broadens my connections with like-minded individuals. Respect for considerate people guides my interactions. Please feel free to contact me to know more about me. :)
